short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scan and rank posts of any group you are part of.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Groupripper helps you in scanning and ranking posts based on the their engagement. You can  find the best Engaged post and the top influencer of a particular group.
